Privacy

This site does not store your data either within your browser or on remote server(s), and site authors do not use any methods to actively log your activity here. In short your data, and cookies, are yours and we no want anything to do with any of that.

The public version of this site is hosted by GitHub Pages, which may log access activity, and directing questions their way regarding relevant policies and practices may be wise. Additionally this site makes features of MetaMask web-browser extension available, the team of which likely has their own privacy policy(s) for you and/or your council to enjoy reviewing.

Self hosting

Those that are concerned about reducing risks of sharing data with third-parties, or are technically curious, are encouraged to host this project privately. Here are a few commands for how to download the source code and review relevant documentation for self-hosting; 

git clone https://github.com/web-dev-examples/ecdsa-tools
cd wallet-examples
vim .github/README.md
